sen.j: 素意（そい、生年不詳 - 嘉保元年（1094年））は、平安時代中期から後期にかけての僧・歌人。
sen.e: Soi (the year of birth is not clear - 1094) was a monk/waka poet who was active from the middle to the end of Heian Period.
Soi (the year of birth is not clear - 1094) was a monk/waka poet who was active from the middle to the end of Heian Period.
Soi (year of birth unknown - 1094) was a monk and a waka poet who was active from the middle to the end of Heian period.
sen.cmt: year of birth unknownと訂正しました。a monk and a waka poetと訂正しました。period小文字にしました。

sen.j: 官職が紀伊国守であったことから紀伊入道とも称される。
sen.e: He is also called Kii Nyudo since his government post was Ki no kuni no kami (governor of Kii Province).

sen.j: 女流歌人の祐子内親王家紀伊の夫とされる。
sen.e: It is believed that he was a husband of Kii of Imperial Princess Yuko family, a woman waka poet.

sen.j: 1083年（永保3年）には和泉国に寂静寺を開いている。
sen.e: In 1083, he founded Jakujo-ji Temple in Izumi Province.
